short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use our new tab page to quickly review your Supermind cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Supermind Reviewer provides the ability to review your cards in the new tab page. This makes reviewing the quickest and easiest experience, helping you achieve your learning goals faster.
